text: "Fraction Too Much Friction" is a 1983 debut single by New Zealand singer Tim Finn and is the leading single from his debut studio album Escapade. It went to number 2 in New Zealand and number 8 in Australia. It won Best Video at the 1983 Countdown Australian Music Awards. ==Track listing== ;Australian/New Zealand 7" single (K-9118) *A. "Fraction Too Much Friction – 4:14 *B. "Below the Belt" – 4:20 ==References== Category:1983 songs Category:Debut singles Category:Pop songs Category:Tim Finn songs
title: Fraction Too Much Friction
